description:
doc/contribute.html: mention hg mail during hg change discussion

People keep not reading all the way to the bottom of the doc
and not running hg mail.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=f44efe3fe995 ***

doc/contribute.html: mention hg mail during hg change discussion

People keep not reading all the way to the bottom of the doc
and not running hg mail.

R=golang-dev, minux.ma
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7137057

LGTM. https://codereview.appspot.com/7137057/diff/5001/doc/contribute.html File doc/contribute.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/7137057/diff/5001/doc/contribute.html#newcode294 doc/contribute.html:294: notify anyone about it. To do that, you need to run hg mail (see below).

subject: code review 7137057: doc/contribute.html: mention hg mail during hg change d...
